trans-unit.source: Storage page: Page where to store mails which are not sent from a FE page (e.g. BE, Scheduler task, etc.)
Override storage page: Check this box to use the above storage page for all mails. Otherwise, mails sent from a given page in the FE are stored in that page.
Original transport: Define transport to use when sending the mails (mail, smtp, sendmail, mbox). Will override $TYPO3_CONF_VARS['MAIL']['transport'].
